headline: Why Hasbro, Mattel, and Walmart Stock Investors Love President Trump's Latest Tariffs Promise
summary: If tariffs on China fall "substantially," one of these three consumer goods stocks is a lot cheaper than the others. And one is still really, really expensive.

headline: Earnings To Watch: Hasbro (HAS) Reports Q1 Results Tomorrow
summary: Toy and entertainment company Hasbro (NASDAQ:HAS) will be reporting earnings tomorrow before market open. Here’s what to look for.

headline: Hasbro Gears Up for Q1 Earnings: What's in the Offing for the Stock?
summary: HAS' first-quarter fiscal 2025 performance is likely to have been aided by the strong performance across the MAGIC ecosystem, and growth in licensing and lower promotional discounts.
